message: Often when people want a ZeroMQ backend they are not aware that ZeroMQ is very different from AMQP
@asksol  what is the difference between ZeroMQ and AMGP? The former is broker-less and latter is a protocol?
@est Exactly, ZeroMQ is broker-less, and is often referred to as sockets as programmers think they work.  AMQP is a full broker specification, with support for persistent messages.
